So guys, there's no netorare at all actually. (Well for the MC)
Basically the blonde GF went on a shopping spree with her brother to get a cool gift for MC, but black hair girl took a picture of them in secret.
Black hair girl knows the two blondes are brother/sister but she lies to MC that they're cheating on him.
She then proceeds to steal MC from the blonde girl who was only going shopping with her brother.
Its NTR in a way, but its the black hair girl stealing MC from the blonde girl with false information.

Perspectives: Who is the actually MC? the faceless teacher or the student?... Either way, from the student POV, she "stole" the female teacher's BF (Netori, no NTR). From the Mr. Faceless POV, is he in a relationship or is just a crush on the F.teacher? Either way is Cheating (forcing a little on the 2nd case). Here we need to have more "feedback" from the fem teacher to call this NTR, more protagonism.
And please stop the reverse-NTR, reverse-Rape, reverse-Shi7 when the gender on these stories barely matter.
